history.proof: intros x e. unfold AbsRing_ball. unfold abs. hauto use: @plus_comm, @abs_zero, cond_pos, @plus_opp_l unfold: Rgt, minus, AbsRing.AbelianGroup, AbelianGroup.sort, abs.

original: intros x e. unfold AbsRing_ball. unfold abs. apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rabs (minus x x)). - apply Rlt_le_trans with 0. + apply Rabs_pos_lt. apply abs_eq_zero. apply abs_zero. + apply Rabs_pos. - apply Rabs_pos_eq. reflexivity.
